ComicInfo.Title: The Dead Awaken; The Thing from the Center of the Earth; The Little People; Wax Museum
ComicInfo.Summary: Two scientists sending electrical waves into the earth's crust are startled to receive a similar signal in reply. Excited about the prospect of intelligent life living beneath the Earth, they guide the being to the surface. The being turns out to be a huge humanoid creature with malevolent intentions.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bob Powell,Warren Kremer,Joe Certa,Bob Powell,Warren Kremer,Joe Certa
ComicInfo.Inker: Howard Nostrand,Warren Kremer,Joe Certa,Howard Nostrand,Warren Kremer,Joe Certa
